requirements: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS
Ability to work with code editors and terminals
Understanding of responsive web design and cross-browser compatibility
objectives: 1. Understand the basics of HTML and CSS
2. Learn how to build a static website using HTML and CSS
3. Explore different web development frameworks and libraries
4. Gain knowledge of JavaScript and its role in web development
5. Develop problem-solving skills in web development

requirements: Basic understanding of computer and internet usage
Ability to use a text editor
Knowledge of basic HTML tags and syntax
objectives: Understand the basic structure and syntax of HTML
Learn how to create different types of HTML elements and tags
Explore the usage of attributes and their impact on HTML elements
Master the art of formatting and organizing content using HTML
Acquire the skills to create and link multiple web pages using HTML

requirements: Ability to work with Responsive Web Design
objectives: Understanding the basics of CSS syntax
Mastering CSS selectors and their specificity
Exploring various CSS layout techniques
Learning to create responsive designs using media queries
Understanding CSS animation and transition properties

requirements: Access to a computer with internet connection
objectives: Understand the basic syntax and structure of JavaScript
Learn how to declare and use variables in JavaScript
Master the fundamental data types and operations in JavaScript
Become proficient in using conditional statements and loops in JavaScript
Explore and utilize functions to write reusable code in JavaScript
